Bouncy Castle Cryptography Library 1.77.00
  • Prev
  • Next
  • Frames
  • No Frames
  • All Classes

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.bouncycastle.tls.BulkCipherAlgorithm
    Will be removed.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.ECBasisType
    Will be removed.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.bouncycastle.tls.AbstractTlsServer.checkServerExtensions()
    Use 'serverExtensions' directly, it is now never null
    org.bouncycastle.tls.DTLSProtocol.evaluateMaxFragmentLengthExtension(boolean, Hashtable, Hashtable, short)
    Will be removed.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsRSAUtils.generateEncryptedPreMasterSecret(TlsContext, TlsCertificate, OutputStream)
    Use TlsUtils.generateEncryptedPreMasterSecret(TlsContext, TlsEncryptor, OutputStream) instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.RecordPreview.getApplicationDataLimit()
    Use RecordPreview.getContentLimit() instead
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsExtensionsUtils.getClientCertificateTypeExtensionServer(Hashtable, short)
    Use version without defaultValue instead
    org.bouncycastle.tls.ClientHello.getClientVersion()
    Use ClientHello.getVersion() instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.SecurityParameters.getCompressionAlgorithm()
    Will be removed. Use constant CompressionMethod._null instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.getHashAlgorithmForPRFAlgorithm(int)
    Will be removed. TlsCryptoUtils.getHashForPRF(int) should be a useful alternative.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.SecurityParameters.getPrfAlgorithm()
    Use SecurityParameters.getPRFAlgorithm() instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.SecurityParameters.getPRFHashAlgorithm()
    Use SecurityParameters.getPRFCryptoHashAlgorithm() instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.SignatureScheme.getRSAPSSCryptoHashAlgorithm(int)
    Use {@link #getCryptoHashAlgorithm(int) instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsExtensionsUtils.getServerCertificateTypeExtensionServer(Hashtable, short)
    Use version without defaultValue instead
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.getSignatureAndHashAlgorithm(TlsContext, TlsCredentialedSigner)
    Will be removed
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.getSupportedCipherSuites(TlsCrypto, int[], int)
    Use TlsUtils.getSupportedCipherSuites(TlsCrypto, int[], int, int) instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.isValidCipherSuiteForVersion(int, ProtocolVersion)
    Use TlsUtils.isValidVersionForCipherSuite(int, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    org.bouncycastle.jsse.util.URLConnectionUtil.openInputStream(URL)
    Use URLConnectionUtil.openStream(URL) instead
    org.bouncycastle.tls.Certificate.parse(TlsContext, InputStream, OutputStream)
    Use version taking a Certificate.ParseOptions argument instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.PRF(TlsContext, TlsSecret, String, byte[], int)
    Use TlsUtils.PRF(SecurityParameters, TlsSecret, String, byte[], int) instead.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsProtocol.processMaxFragmentLengthExtension(Hashtable, Hashtable, short)
    Will be removed.
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsUtils.readDERObject(byte[])
    Will be removed. Use readASN1Object in combination with requireDEREncoding instead
    org.bouncycastle.tls.TlsPeer.shouldCheckSigAlgOfPeerCerts()
    No longer called by the protocol classes. Can call TlsUtils.checkPeerSigAlgs(TlsContext, TlsCertificate[]) once a complete CertPath has been determined (i.e. as part of chain validation).
